00022     template <int dimworld>
00023     class GridFactory<FoamGrid<dimworld> > 
00024         : public GridFactoryInterface<FoamGrid<dimworld> > {
00025 
00027         typedef typename FoamGrid<dimworld>::ctype ctype;
00028 
00029         typedef typename std::map<FieldVector<ctype,1>, unsigned int>::iterator VertexIterator;
00030         
00031         enum {dim = FoamGrid<dimworld>::dimension};
00032 
00033     public:
00034 
00036         GridFactory()
00037             : factoryOwnsGrid_(true),
00038               vertexIndex_(0)
00039         {
00040             grid_ = new FoamGrid<dimworld>;
00041 
00042             grid_->entityImps_.resize(1);
00043         }
00044 
00054         GridFactory(FoamGrid<dimworld>* grid)
00055             : factoryOwnsGrid_(false),
00056               vertexIndex_(0)
00057         {
00058             grid_ = grid;
00059 
00060             grid_->entityImps_.resize(1);
00061         }
00062         
00064         virtual ~GridFactory() {
00065             if (grid_ && factoryOwnsGrid_)
00066                 delete grid_;
00067         }
00068 
00070         virtual void insertVertex(const FieldVector<ctype,dimworld>& pos) {
00071             Dune::get<0>(grid_->entityImps_[0]).push_back(FoamGridEntityImp<0,dimworld> (0,   // level
00072                                                                          pos,  // position
00073                                                                          grid_->freeIdCounter_[0]++));
00074             vertexArray_.push_back(&*Dune::get<0>(grid_->entityImps_[0]).rbegin());
00075         }
00076 
00081         virtual void insertElement(const GeometryType& type,
00082                                    const std::vector<unsigned int>& vertices) {
00083 
00084             assert(type.isTriangle());
00085 
00086             FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld> newElement(0,   // level
00087                                        grid_->freeIdCounter_[dim]++);  // id
00088             newElement.vertex_[0] = vertexArray_[vertices[0]];
00089             newElement.vertex_[1] = vertexArray_[vertices[1]];
00090             newElement.vertex_[2] = vertexArray_[vertices[2]];
00091 
00092             Dune::get<dim>(grid_->entityImps_[0]).push_back(newElement);
00093 
00094             
00095         }
00096 
00101         virtual void insertBoundarySegment(const std::vector<unsigned int>& vertices) {
00102             DUNE_THROW(Dune::NotImplemented, "insertBoundarySegment not implemented yet!");
00103         }
00104 
00110         virtual void insertBoundarySegment(const std::vector<unsigned int>& vertices,
00111                                            const shared_ptr<BoundarySegment<2> > boundarySegment)
00112         {
00113             insertBoundarySegment(vertices);
00114         }
00115 
00120         virtual FoamGrid<dimworld>* createGrid() {
00121             // Prevent a crash when this method is called twice in a row
00122             // You never know who may do this...
00123             if (grid_==NULL)
00124                 return NULL;
00125 
00126             // ////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00127             //   Create the edges
00128             // ////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00129 
00130             // for convenience
00131             typedef FoamGridEntityImp<0,dimworld> FoamGridVertex;
00132 
00133             // For fast retrieval: a map from pairs of vertices to the edge that connects them
00134             std::map<std::pair<const FoamGridEntityImp<0,dimworld>*, const FoamGridEntityImp<0,dimworld>*>, FoamGridEntityImp<1,dimworld>*> edgeMap;
00135 
00136             typename std::list<FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld> >::iterator eIt    = Dune::get<2>(grid_->entityImps_[0]).begin();
00137             typename std::list<FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld> >::iterator eEndIt = Dune::get<2>(grid_->entityImps_[0]).end();
00138 
00139             for (; eIt!=eEndIt; ++eIt) {
00140 
00141                 FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld>* element = &(*eIt);
00142 
00143                 const Dune::GenericReferenceElement<double,dim>& refElement
00144                     = Dune::GenericReferenceElements<double, dim>::general(eIt->type());
00145 
00146                 // Loop over all edges of this element
00147                 for (size_t i=0; i<element->edges_.size(); ++i) {
00148 
00149                     // Get two vertices of the potential edge
00150                     const FoamGridVertex* v0 = element->vertex_[refElement.subEntity(i, 1, 0, 2)];
00151                     const FoamGridVertex* v1 = element->vertex_[refElement.subEntity(i, 1, 1, 2)];
00152 
00153                     FoamGridEntityImp<1,dimworld>* existingEdge = NULL;
00154                     typename std::map<std::pair<const FoamGridEntityImp<0,dimworld>*, const FoamGridEntityImp<0,dimworld>*>, FoamGridEntityImp<1,dimworld>*>::const_iterator e = edgeMap.find(std::make_pair(v0,v1));
00155 
00156                     if (e != edgeMap.end()) {
00157                         existingEdge = e->second;
00158                     } else {
00159                         e = edgeMap.find(std::make_pair(v1,v0));
00160                         if (e != edgeMap.end())
00161                             existingEdge = e->second;
00162                     }
00163 
00164                     if (existingEdge == NULL) {
00165 
00166                         // The current edge has not been inserted already.  We do that now
00167 
00168                         Dune::get<1>(grid_->entityImps_[0]).push_back(FoamGridEntityImp<1,dimworld>(v0,
00169                                                                                                     v1,
00170                                                                                                     0,   // level
00171                                                                                                     grid_->freeIdCounter_[1]++    // id
00172                                                                                                     ));
00173 
00174                         existingEdge = &*Dune::get<1>(grid_->entityImps_[0]).rbegin();
00175                                                                    
00176                         edgeMap.insert(std::make_pair(std::make_pair(v0,v1), existingEdge));
00177                         
00178                     }
00179 
00180                     // make element know about the edge
00181                     element->edges_[i] = existingEdge;
00182 
00183                     // make edge know about the element
00184                     existingEdge->elements_.push_back(element);
00185 
00186                 }
00187 
00188             }
00189 
00190             // Create the index sets
00191             grid_->setIndices();
00192             
00193 
00194             // ////////////////////////////////////////////////
00195             //   Set the boundary ids
00196             //  \todo It must be possible to set them by hand
00197             // ////////////////////////////////////////////////
00198 
00199             unsigned int boundaryIdCounter = 0;
00200 
00201             for (typename std::list<FoamGridEntityImp<1,dimworld> >::iterator it = Dune::get<1>(grid_->entityImps_[0]).begin();
00202                  it != Dune::get<1>(grid_->entityImps_[0]).end();
00203                  ++it)
00204                 it->boundaryId_ = boundaryIdCounter++;
00205 
00206 
00207             // ////////////////////////////////////////////////
00208             //   Hand over the new grid
00209             // ////////////////////////////////////////////////
00210 
00211             Dune::FoamGrid<dimworld>* tmp = grid_;
00212             grid_ = NULL;
00213             return tmp;
00214         }
00215 
00216     private:
00217 
00218         // Initialize the grid structure in UG
00219         void createBegin();
00220 
00221         // Pointer to the grid being built
00222         FoamGrid<dimworld>* grid_;
00223 
00224         // True if the factory allocated the grid itself, false if the
00225         // grid was handed over from the outside
00226         bool factoryOwnsGrid_;
00227 
00229         unsigned int vertexIndex_;
00230 
00231         std::vector<FoamGridEntityImp<0,dimworld>*> vertexArray_;
00232 
00233     };

00235 }
